entry.title: RT Onchain Wizard: Some recent examples using one of my favorite @ChainEDGE_io filters. By alerting for high PnL non sniper but early wallets, aping i...
entry.summary: RT Onchain Wizard Some recent examples using one of my favorite @ChainEDGE_io filters. By alerting for high PnL non sniper but early wallets, aping in size, you are getting quite the signal. These are up 2-3x which doesn’t compare to the “ping every launch” bots. But these ping a few times…
